content.rendered:
Experience our

SkyLounge

The Sky Lounge is located on the rooftop of King’s Club near Malathalli Lake, boasting beautiful green views and excellent natural lighting. In Bangalore, it is among one of the most beautiful and authentic Sky lounges where everything from picking up the ingredients to plating up the food is perfect. The event planning staff at our club makes your celebrations astonish.


Before each of the dishes is prepared in the kitchen, it is subjected to several quality checks and must satisfy a number of attributes. Every time you visit here, you will be greeted by our well-behaved staff.


As one of the most popular Indian restaurants serving vegetarian and non-vegetarian food. Our menu includes a variety of international and fusion dishes.  With the additional features of the outdoor seating areas, you will be mesmerized in an amazing ambiance with a bit of a contemporary flair.


Food lovers will find Kings Club Sky Lounge to be a completely unique and heart-warming experience. The Roof Garden also features imported furniture of the highest quality. The main attraction for our members is our cinema screen, where they can watch live cricket and sports. It features fountains, a fish aquarium, and good landscaping.  

With food & beverages you won’t be disappointed! Elegant yet traditional, modern yet authentic!

Features & Amenities

Kings Club Sky lounge is well-known for its flair for services. Here are the features of Kings Club Sky lounge:
  • A stay in amazing Sky lounge is always a special time for our guests/members.
  • It features all the amenities and services of a luxury 5-star hotel coupled with gorgeous attraction.
  • Unique feel-at-home atmosphere.
  • You can also find an extensive choice of desserts that add to the overall dining experience.
  • Quality food
  • Great service at an affordable price point.

Here are the amenities of Kings Club Sky lounge:

  • Private entrance with dedicated elevator
  • Outdoor and indoor spaces
  • Retractable roof structures
  • Candlelight Lounge
  • Large Screen TVs
  • State of the Art Sound & AV system
  • DJ equipment
  • Dance Lights
Pamper yourself with delicious dishes & perfect beverage and complete your experience!!

Please wait while flipbook is loading. For more related info, FAQs and issues please refer to DearFlip WordPress Flipbook Plugin Help documentation.

Types of Cuisines

The open-air barbeque at Kings Club Sky lounge sizzles with delectable delights to tempt hungry guests/members. This Sky Lounge is the destination to enjoy twilight dining and late night mingling. The menu at Kings Club Sky lounge encapsulates a variety of famous dishes from all types of cuisines.
Previous
Next
Enjoy a genuine, moonlit dining experience with a complimentary valentine-inspired cocktail!!

Types of Events You Can Host

Kings Club Sky lounge is the perfect venue for luncheons, corporate meetings, receptions, social gatherings, birthday parties, weddings, holiday parties, & many more. You can organize a plethora of events as well which call for massive celebrations. Kings Club Sky lounge with plentiful space set out a significant venue for hosting any event in refined surroundings, blessed with heavenly aromas.
Previous
Next

Private Dining Area

Kings Club Sky lounge provides a cozy setting to meet with friends or business partners in a private & calm environment. It is an amazing place for in-house members that can also get the facility of free Wi-Fi access. It serves snacks and refreshments as well as set buffet for lunch and dinner.

About Chef & Staffs

Gopal

Kings Club Sky lounge has highly trained chefs that cook world-class buffets, multi-cuisines for its esteemed members. Our chefs have engineered the menu whether be it starters, main course & platters or dessert. We an expert team of chefs with high standards of hygiene offer excellent food services.

Kings Club offers a serene atmosphere, classy ambiance that is meant to light up your soul and space to indulge in your favorite activities. You need not to look out for any other place for scrumptious food & beverages.
